content.question: Which of the following indicates the better resonance structure and best explains why? (Formal charges are provided in circles on the diagrams.)

choices.label: Structure 1, because it has two double bonds and is therefore more symmetrical.
Structure 1, because the negative formal charge is on the more electronegative element.
Structure 2, because the triple bond between the two nitrogen atoms is stronger than the double bond.
Structure 2, because the negative formal charge is on the more electronegative element.

content.answer: Structure 2, because the negative formal charge is on the more electronegative element.

skill.text: 6.C: Support a claim with evidence from representations or models at the particulate level, such as the structure of atoms and/or molecules.
